summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." It instructs users to respect robots.txt rules and acknowledges rate limiting based on IP addresses. It directs users to the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service for accessing data, likely related to government documents. The bill aims to regulate how data is scraped from government websites and sets guidelines for appropriate behavior. It suggests providing a functional alternative via GPO bulk data as an alternative pathway to data scraping.
